items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a win!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Stunning dress. Fair price. Ordered September 1, 2025 and delivered September 12, 2025. My colleagues were shocked that this was on Amazon. They said it looked like it was from a bridal shop. Wore to a black tie event and received so many compliments. A photographer for a local luxury magazine requested photos. 5’10 about 166 lbs. DD cup. And also had on a 3” heel. Went with size 12. Used the individual sticky bra pads from Amazon. The back is a lace tie up top and a small zipper under that around the hips/lower back with pretty satin buttons covering it in the back. It did arrive wrinkled which is to be expected so we had the dry cleaner steam it before the event and kept it hung well off the floor. The car ride to the event it did wrinkle a bit in the back from sitting on it for 30 minutes but it relaxed fairly quickly again while walking around. Since I’m tall I loved the length. I did have to hold the dress in one hand when walking so as not to trip, but it was so worth it. Not a problem at all for me, but shorter ladies may need a hem up if you’re not looking for a train. Color was champagne. Purchased around $79 plus shipping since it was not prime. Overall it was at or around $100 ish total. Can’t beat that price. Did a lot of research before buying. I liked this one because it had straps as opposed to all the other vendors being strapless. The straps are adjustable and I purchased the Champagne color. Was happy I went with this one with the straps. It also has pockets that you can’t see at all but they’re good, deep pockets. It was hard finding a dress with the slit on the right leg but this one was! I needed to hide my left leg. I can’t remember if this was the dress vendor that had a US location for returns but read the seller page. I bought two different dresses from two sellers. Can’t remember on this one but that was a common complaint on other non prime vendors was that the shipping cost was too high to return back to overseas. Def read into that if you think you might need a different size. Sizing was about 1 - 1 1/2 sizes smaller than regular dress size. Read the size chart. I’m normally a 10 and this one in 12 fit. The back lace was just right. Not all the way closed but not too widely opened. If it did not have lace no way would it have fit me though. Thankful for the tie up style. Read more
items.author: BarnesFamily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Loved this dress!!! It fit nice and I sized up 1 size to make sure it fit right and that was a great Idea!! I likes how it looked I loved the corset type of style!! It wasn’t to think or think, and the color was just amazing! Definitely recommend this dress! Read more
items.author: Karsyn Bladow

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars high quality
items.body: The dress is really beautiful. The color matches more the shade of the bottom of the picture. It' made really well, looks real high quality for the price. I got a 14 but I guess I'm just kind of chubby from nursing my baby. It' was a little too small on me but obviously long. I hope I can lose enough weight to fit into it in time. It took almost 2 weeks to get in the mail. I didn't have enough time to get it exchanged for a bigger size. It would have been a 5 star if it came sooner. Read more
items.author: Anjelica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy the dress
items.body: Purchased this to wear at my daughter’s wedding. (Her choice lol) the seller contacted me and got my measurements and this gorgeous dress came tailored for me. Read more
items.author: Larry trout

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the Money
items.body: My dress was comfy, smooth, and true to size. The dress was flattering in all the right places while enabling me to hide what was left of the pregnancy weight around my belly. It was good value for my money spent on it. The pocket was deep enough to hide my cell phone in. My baby liked the texture of the fabric, and enjoyed playing with my dress. My husband liked the look of the dress, and chose it as his favorite out of the dress options photographs I had showed him. He liked the dress better in person than in the Amazon photographs. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing customer service
items.body: This dress is beautiful. The quality is amazing. It fits like a glove thanks to the seller asking for my exact measurements. It’s even perfect length and I’m 6’0 and did not want to wear heels. 10/10 customer service and dress. So happy with it Read more
items.author: Jo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended
items.body: Seller is amazing, they'd ask for your measurements and instructions are very easy and clear. The dress fits perfectly. Material is quality. I love it! Ordered the black. Read more
items.author: Idel Laza-Velasquez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
items.body: Dress arrived well packaged,does not appear cheap when worn.The dress hung and flowed well,I received several compliments on it through out the evening.Beautiful dress & worth. Read more
items.author: brandie ross

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Peacock, Plum, Lavender, Royal Blue, Teal, Turquoise, Sky Blue, Gold, Burgundy, Burnt Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
